All Classes and Interfaces

Class
Description
AdminHomeActivity
An activity for the admin home page, providing navigation to different administrative functions like browsing events, profiles, and images.
BaseImageHandler
The abstract base class for handling image-related operations such as uploading, retrieving, and removing images from firebase storage.
DashboardFragment
 
DashboardViewModel
 
DatabaseManager
The DatabaseManager class is responsible for managing the database connection and providing database-related functionality.
DeviceIDManager
The DeviceIDManager class is responsible for managing the unique device ID.
DocumentSerializable
This class represents a DocumentSerializable, which is an abstract class that provides methods for converting objects to and from Firestore documents.
EnterEventDetailsActivity
EnterEventDetailsActivity is an activity class for entering the details of a new event.
Event
Represents an event, including information about the event name, organizer, date, and attendees.
event_info_view_and_signup
A DialogFragment that presents detailed information about an event and provides an interface for user signup.
EventPosterImageHandler
The EventPosterImageHandler class extends the BaseImageHandler class and provides methods to upload, retrieve, and remove event poster images from Firebase Storage.
EventSignUpActivity
 
EventTable
The EventTable class represents a table in the database for storing events.
ExampleInstrumentedTest
Instrumented test, which will execute on an Android device.
ExampleUnitTest
Example local unit test, which will execute on the development machine (host).
GenerateInfoCheckinActivity
 
GenerateQRCodesActivity
GenerateQRCodesActivity is an activity class for creating the check-in QR code.
HomeFragment
 
HomeViewModel
 
InitialSetupActivity
InitialSetupActivity is an activity for initial setup where users can enter their name as part of the application's onboarding process.
LoadingScreenActivity
LoadingScreenActivity is an activity displayed during the startup of the application.
MainActivity
MainActivity serves as the primary entry point for the Placeholder application.
NotificationsFragment
 
NotificationsViewModel
 
PlaceholderApp
PlaceholderApp extends Application to provide a centralized location for managing global application state.
Profile
This class represents a user profile.
ProfileEditActivity
The ProfileEditActivity class allows users to edit their profile information.
ProfileImageHandler
The ProfileImageHandler class is responsible for handling profile image-related operations such as uploading, retrieving, and removing profile images.
ProfileTable
The ProfileTable class represents a table in the database for storing profiles.
ProfileTableTest
 
QRCode
Represents a QR Code for an event, encapsulating the event ID and the type of QR code.
QRCodeManager
 
QRCodeManager
Manages QR code generation and processing for events, including generating QR codes with event information, determining QR code types, and facilitating event joining through QR code scanning.
QRcodeScanner
QRcodeScanner is an activity for scanning QR codes using the device's camera.
QRCodeTest
 
QRCodeType
An enum for QR_Codes so we can easily check their type
Table<T extends DocumentSerializable>
The Table class is an abstract class that represents a table in the database.
Table.DocumentCallback<T>
Callback interface for document operations in the Table class.
UploadPosterActivity
UploadPosterActivity allows users to upload a poster image for an event.
UserNotification
User notification constructor, will go here once we implement them
ViewEventDetailsActivity
 
ViewQRCodesActivity
The ViewQRCodesActivity is an activity class for viewing and sharing the generated QR codes
